description: Complete system overview documenting the multi-agent AI development framework architecture, key components, and high-level data flow
Detailed documentation of the context injection system algorithm, including token optimization, context hierarchy rules, and session state management logic
Comprehensive documentation of the multi-agent system architecture, including agent allocation algorithms, specialization rules, and inter-agent communication patterns
Detailed specification of the 3-tier documentation system, including classification algorithms, content migration rules, and tier relationship models
Documentation of data flow through the system, covering context preservation, session handoffs, and cross-component communication patterns
